I can understand why people don't like that it isn't much related to Ellie's half. But I think it is related to the theme\, the game is making you play instead of telling you what to think or feel about a character. You're taken on a ride with Abby and Lev that reminded me of the Joel and Ellie dynamic but in a unique and interesting way. As soon as Abby makes the choice to betray her people for the ones she cares about and gain her humanity back\, we are asked to undergo a similar change. We are forced to ask ourselves\, \"Am I willing to forgive her?\". If the answer is yes\, then it becomes all the more painful to see the death and destruction Ellie caused from Abby's point of view. Just as soon as she was redeemed\, Abby had to lose all over again. And when these two collide\, they know nothing about each other and we know everything\, we understand both sides.
